summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 FORD FUSION. WHILE STARTING UP THE VEHICLE THE POWER STEERING FAULT ASSIST ILLUMINATED ON THE DASHBOARD WHICH RESULTED IN LOSS OF STEERING. THIS FAILURE OCCURED MULTIPLE TIMES WHICH REQUIRED TOWING TO THE DEALERSHIP (SCHAUMBURG FORD 815 E GOLF RD SHAUMBURG, ILLINOIS, 60173) (847-605-0800). THE POWER STEERING ASSEMBLY WAS THEN REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 81,000. *TT
